title: Machine Learning-Based Detection of Ransomware Using SDN
venue: 2018 ACM International Workshop on Security in Software Defined Networks & Network Function Virtualization (SDN-NFV Sec'18)
excerpt: Workshop paper looking at the efficacy of detecting ransomware via its network traffic trace using high-rate network switches.
citation: Greg Cusack, Oliver Michel, Eric Keller. (2018). "Machine Learning-Based Detection of Ransomware Using SDN." SDN-NFV Sec'18.
